name: Court Reservation – Manage Your Court Bookings Online
author: Webm√ºhle e.U.

sections.description:
With this plugin, it is easy and quick to integrate a reservation system on your WordPress site. With just a few clicks, you can create additional courts which can then be integrated via shortcode anywhere on your website.
With our new ULTIMATE plan, you can create unlimited pyramid competitions/tournaments, where members of your club can challenge each other. Pyramids are as fast and easy to set up as our regular court reservations system and brings a lot of new excitement into your club.

FEATURES OF THE FREE VERSION
* Create one court
* Weekly recurring, or single events (such as trainings, tournaments, etc.)
* Making reservations in the frontend
* Deleting reservations in the frontend
* Member management within the Plugin Settings (limited to 100 members)
* Customize the design of the reservation table
* “Calendar View”

FEATURES OF THE PREMIUM VERSION
* All of the FREE VERSION, but no limitation in possible courts or members
* For just 129,99$ a year

FEATURES OF THE ULTIMATE VERSION
* All of the PREMIUM VERSION, and
* Ladder Competitions / Pyramid Tournaments
* Individual colors for reservation types
* For just 199,99$ a year

A detailed list of all functions can be found on https://www.courtreservation.io.

Use these Shortcodes to integrate reservation tables anywhere on your website:

Full View- All-courts:
[courtreservation-full-view]

Full View – Specific courts:
[courtreservation-full-view id=1,2,3]

Single court view:
[courtreservation id=1]

SUPPORT
The plugin is constantly being developed and supported. Support inquiries please only by email office@webmuehle.at

Video Review
sections.installation: Upload the plugin via ZIP or install and activate it via the WordPress plugin installer. Afterwards all settings can be adjusted.
